name: Car Game (AGameByBen)
description:
Controls:

  • W/S - Accelerate and Reverse
  • A/D - Steer Left and Right
  • Space - Handbrake / Shoot
  • Left Shift - Boost
  • E - Swap Camera

Gameplay:

Destroy all enemies to progress to the next wave and defeat the boss, after defeating the boss, the game may reset (keeping your upgrades) and allow you to become even more powerful.

Further Notes:

Thank you for giving Car Game a try, this is a Demo and you may encounter bugs. For more information on this game, check out my YouTube Channel: A Game By Ben

I will continue to update this Demo until I feel it is a good representation of the final product, any updates could include;

  • Bug Fixes
  • New Upgrades
  • New Enemies
  • New Weapons

Any donations would be greatly appreciated and will be put purely towards the development of the game, thank you very much!

Known Issues:

  • Doesn't Run on Mac (yet)
